name: email
description: Syndicate articles to email subscribers via Buttondown

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && concurrently "esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --format=iife --global-name=EmailNewsletter --outfile=dist/main.bundle.js --watch" "npm run watch-assets"
